dataset_info.description: Metadata for the HER Catalysts Dataset describing identifiers, targets, and features.

identifiers.Reference: DOI of the publication where the data were taken [10-67].
identifiers.Formula: A string representation of the alloy composition (e.g., 'Al10Co20Cr20Fe20Ni30'), providing a human-readable identifier.
identifiers.Elemental_composition: 18 normalized and alphabetized nominal alloy composition, in atomic percent (Ag, Al, Au, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, Ir, Mg, Mn, Mo, Ni, Pd, Pt, Rh, Ru, W, and Zn).

target_properties.onset_potential: The experimental HER onset potential, measured in millivolts (mV).
target_properties.tafel_slope: The experimental Tafel slope, measured in mV dec-1, representing the reaction kinetics.

feature_space.description: The dataset includes the subset of Magpie statistics identified as the most information-rich descriptors via Mutual Information selection. The columns follow the naming convention MagpieData [statistic] [property].

statistics_definitions.minimum: min over the element-wise property values.
statistics_definitions.maximum: max over the element-wise property values.
statistics_definitions.range: (max - min) over the element-wise property values.
statistics_definitions.avg_dev: mean absolute deviation from the (weighted) mean.
statistics_definitions.mode: most frequent value (with weights); in case of ties, the minimum among tied values is returned.

properties.NsValence: number of filled s valence orbitals.
properties.NdValence: number of filled d valence orbitals (often relevant for transition-metal chemistry).
properties.NsUnfilled: number of unfilled s valence orbitals.

properties.Number: atomic number Z (proxy for nuclear charge and periodic position).
properties.MeltingT: elemental melting temperature (K), reflecting cohesive bonding strength at the element level.
properties.GSvolume_pa: DFT-computed ground-state (T = 0 K) volume per atom (Å³ atom⁻¹), capturing steric/packing trends of elemental solids.
properties.CovalentRadius: covalent radius (typically reported in pm in Magpie tables), linked to characteristic bond lengths and size mismatch in alloys.

properties.Electronegativity: Pauling electronegativity, describing electron-attracting tendency and influencing charge transfer.
properties.MendeleevNumber: an ordering index of elements on the periodic table used to group chemically similar elements (in Magpie, defined as a position index 'counting columnwise from H').
